title: Replace a lost, stolen, damaged or destroyed driving licence

details.description: Apply for a new driving licence online if it's been lost, stolen, damaged or destroyed
details.more_information:
You’ll need your driving licence number if you know it and will have to pay £20 online.

If you want to renew the photo on your licence as part of your application you'll need a UK passport issued in the last 5 years. 

^DVLA will try to get an electronic copy of your passport photo. If they can't, you'll need to print and send a form with a photo.^

If you find your old licence after applying for, or receiving, a new licence you must return your old licence to DVLA explaining what's happened.

%Driving licences issued from 19 January 2013 will look different, but your existing licence will still be valid.%

*[DVLA]: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency
details.introduction: If your driving licence has been lost, stolen, damaged or destroyed you can apply and pay for a new one online. Apply using your Government Gateway ID. If you don't have one or need to re-register, you'll get an ID as part of your application.
details.will_continue_on: the replace your driving licence tool
details.alternate_methods:
##If you’ve got a photocard driving licence

You can apply by phone if none of your details have changed.

$C

**DVLA**  
**Telephone:** 0300 790 6801  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 7pm   
Saturday, 8am to 2pm

$C

^You can’t apply by phone if your photo has expired or is about to expire.^

To apply by post fill in form D1 ‘application for a driving licence’, available from Post Offices or the [DVLA form ordering service.](https://www.dvla.gov.uk/dvla/onlineservices/order_forms.aspx?ext=dg "DVLA form ordering service"){:rel="external"}

Send your application and fee to DVLA. Include the part of your licence you still have if only one part is missing.

$A

DVLA  
Swansea  
SA99 1AB

$A

If your name has changed you’ll also need to send original documents confirming this.

##If you’ve got a paper driving licence

If you’ve got a paper driving licence you can apply by post.

$A

DVLA  
Swansea  
SA99 1AB

$A

You’ll need to:

- fill in form D1 'application for a driving licence', available from Post Offices or the [DVLA form ordering service](https://www.dvla.gov.uk/dvla/onlineservices/order_forms.aspx?ext=dg "DVLA form ordering service"){:rel="external"}
- enclose original [documents confirming your identity](/driving-licence-application-identity-documents "documents confirming your identity")
- include a passport-type photo
- include your paper licence if it’s been damaged

*[DVLA]: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency
